useCase.name: Collaboration with Faculty Members
useCase.trigger: Researcher wants to find faculty members to collaborate with

mainSequence.step: Repository Interface initiates search for faculty members
SearchSystem queries faculty data in FacultyProfiles
SearchSystem displays results to the Researcher
Researcher reviews Faculty interests and expertise
Researcher requests detailed information from FacultyProfiles
FacultyProfiles provides detailed information to Researcher
Researcher selects Faculty members for collaboration
Researcher saves or notes selected Faculty for future collaboration in CollaborationModule
CollaborationModule confirms selection and provides next steps to Researcher
